DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Dietary fat , fruit , vegetable , fiber may affect risk breast cancer recurrence . PURPOSE : Randomized clinical trial determine effectiveness diet rich vegetable , fruit , fiber low fat woman treat stage I , stage II , stage III breast cancer .
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine whether diet rich vegetable , fruit , fiber low fat associate longer breast cancer event-free interval breast cancer survivor . II . Motivate intervention group breast cancer survivor adopt maintain dietary pattern rich vegetable , fruit , fiber low fat . III . Demonstrate intervention produce significant change circulate carotenoid estrogen biomarkers compare healthy control diet . IV . Test whether probability secondary cancer event associate change self-reported dietary intake , circulate carotenoid concentration , circulate estrogen concentration . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord age ( 55 vs 55 time diagnosis ) , stage tumor ( stage I least 1 cm v stage II/IIIA ) , clinical site . Patients randomize one two healthy dietary regimen : Arm I : Patients teach follow dietary pattern produce significant change circulate carotenoid estrogen biomarkers . Arm II : Patients assign follow dietary guideline establish National Cancer Institute USDA . All patient participate 24 hour dietary recall , cook class , well complete several questionnaire , baseline 12 , 24 36 , 48 , 72 month ; randomly select 50 % sample participate recall 6 month . Patients follow telephone every 6 month average 6 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 3,000 woman accrue study within 5 year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Primary operable stage I ( tumor least 1 cm ) , stage II , stage IIIA invasive breast carcinoma Treatment within past 4 year total mastectomy axillary dissection , breast spar surgical removal cancer clear macroscopic margin axillary dissection follow adjuvant breast radiation No evidence recurrent disease new breast cancer since completion initial local treatment confirm within past 6 month physician evaluation , except stage I mastectomy , physician evaluation within 1 year prior randomization Hormone receptor status : Not specify PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 70 time diagnosis Sex : Female Menopausal status : Not specify Performance status : Not specify Life expectancy : At least 10 year ( exclude breast cancer ) Hematopoietic : Not specify Hepatic : No cirrhosis Renal : Not specify Other : Not pregnant Accessible geographically telephone Able communicate dietary data via 24hour food recall Able commit intervention schedule No comorbidity require specific diet take medication contraindicates consume high fiber diet ( e.g. , systemic scleroderma , digestive malabsorption syndrome , insulin dependent diabetes ) No primary recurrent invasive cancer within past 10 year except nonmelanoma skin cancer carcinoma situ cervix PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : No concurrent chemotherapy Endocrine therapy : No concurrent estrogen replacement therapy , include vaginal estrogen cream Radiotherapy : See Disease Characteristics Surgery : See Disease Characteristics Other : No concurrent enrollment another clinical trial dietary restriction endpoint similar study
